text:
Company Background:
Pham-Wyatt is a leading pharmaceutical company dedicated to innovative healthcare solutions. We pride ourselves on a diverse and inclusive workforce that drives our success.

Job Type:
Full-time

Job Description:
We are seeking a dedicated and experienced Deputy Chief of Quality Assurance to join our team. This role is targeted towards women to support our goal of gender diversity. The ideal candidate will be responsible for ensuring the highest quality standards in our products and processes, helping us maintain our reputation for excellence.

Responsibilities:
- Oversee and implement quality assurance programs across all departments.
- Develop and maintain quality assurance policies and procedures.
- Lead a team of quality assurance professionals and provide mentorship and support.
- Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and industry standards.
- Conduct regular audits and inspections to identify areas for improvement.
- Collaborate with other departments to address quality issues and implement solutions.
- Report on quality metrics and performance to senior management.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (e.g., Pharmaceutical Sciences, Chemistry, or related discipline).
- Minimum of 8 years of experience in quality assurance within the pharmaceutical industry.
- Proven leadership and team management skills.
- Strong knowledge of regulatory requirements and quality standards.
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities.
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
- Women are encouraged to apply.

Perks and Benefits:
- Competitive salary ranging from $80,000 to $120,000 based on experience and skills.
- Comprehensive health and dental insurance.
- Paid maternity and paternity leave.
- Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
- Inclusive and supportive work environment.
- Generous vacation and paid time off policies.
- Retirement savings plan with company match.

How to Apply:
If you are a passionate and experienced professional looking to make a significant impact in the pharmaceutical industry, we encourage you to apply. Please submit your resume and cover letter to our recruitment team.

Pham-Wyatt is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
